import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Table } from '../TableUser' import { StyledButton } from '../styled/Button'; import { Box, BoxText, BoxTitle, Container } from '../styled/Home.styled'; import { RejectService,AcceptService,CancelService } from '../styled/Button'; import Popup from '../Popup/Popup'; import { InputFormTxt } from '../styled/Form.style'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { acceptOrderUser } from '../../redux/action-creators'; export default function RecivedOrderPendingList({recievedOrderPendingData,errorRecievedOrderPending}) { const [buttonPopuPAccept,setButtonPopupAccept]=useState(false); const [buttonPopuPReject,setButtonPopupReject]=useState(false); const [price,SetPrice]=useState(false); const [actionData,SetactionData]=useState([]); const dispatch=useDispatch(); return ( <> {console.log('inside',errorRecievedOrderPending)} {!errorRecievedOrderPending ? Service Price Buyer Buyer's Email Buyer's Phone Accept Reject {recievedOrderPendingData.length>0 && recievedOrderPendingData.map((pending)=>( <> {pending.service.title} {'$'+pending.price} {pending.users.name} {pending.users.email} {pending.users.phone} {SetactionData(pending);SetPrice(pending.price);setButtonPopupAccept(true);}}>✓ {SetactionData(pending);setButtonPopupReject(true); } } >X ))} {console.log('action',actionData)} {actionData && <> {actionData?.service?.title} Update price:{event.preventDefault() ;SetPrice(event.target.value)}}/> {console.log('price',price)} { dispatch(acceptOrderUser({id:actionData.id,price:price})) }}>Accept } {console.log('action',actionData)} {actionData && <> Are you sure you want to reject the order ? Yes setButtonPopupReject(false)}>No }
: <> Message {errorRecievedOrderPending.message}
} ) }
